member.name: M:SingingPractice.RegistrationService.Web.Api.Controllers.LicenseController.IssueAsync

member.name: M:SingingPractice.RegistrationService.Web.Api.Controllers.LicenseController.ValidateAsync(System.String)

member.name: M:SingingPractice.RegistrationService.Web.Api.Controllers.LicenseController.ActivateAsync(SingingPractice.RegistrationService.Web.Common.Models.Licenses.ActivateLicenseDto)
